channel.title: Recent research notes on PublicLab.org
channel.description: Open source environmental science research at Public Lab

item.title: Kilimanjaro Citizen Science - KCS-1
item.author: cutlan
item.description: The main aim of phase one is to use time series data as acquired by MODIS Sensors in order to plan better for tree planting activities while looking on high temperature belt which according to Local Communities(Citizens Science) is the source of reducing Ice/Snow on the Mount Kilimanjaro. ** Webpage =\> [http://foo.kilin.or.tz/](http://foo.kilin.or.tz/) Mobile App =\> [https://goo.gl/BjHI88](https://goo.gl/BjHI88)**[](https://goo.gl/BjHI88) [](https://goo.gl/BjHI88) [](https://goo.gl/BjHI88) [](https://goo.gl/BjHI88)
